Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/Washington
ShortDescription: Southbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Washington, Hamlin, Madison and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Washington, Hamlin, Madison and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Washington.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
